actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5. The next meeting is scheduled for 2:00 p.m. on April 17, 2023.

Pursuant to the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 955(b)note), the Democratic Leader reappointed the following member of the House to the National Council on the Arts: Ms. Pingree.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Mike Collins to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
